title: Win a luxury five-star golfing break to Spain with La Manga Club
text: To celebrate the start of the Open Championship, The Telegraph has partnered with La Manga Club and Monarch Airlines to offer one lucky reader the chance to win a dream four-night golfing break to Spain, complete with five-star accommodation, return flights and three rounds of golf. La Manga Club is widely regarded as one of the finest golf destination resorts in Europe, with a rich history of welcoming the great and the good of the game. Golfers have been flocking to this unique corner of Spain for more than 40 years, lured by its three varied 18-hole courses, a David Leadbetter Golf Academy, extensive practice facilities and the additional benefits of a world-class 28-court tennis centre, a 2000sqm spa complex and its own Mediterranean beach cove. For more information on La Manga Club, click here For more information on Monarch Airlines, click here The Prize (for two people sharing a twin/double room): • Four nights at the five-star La Manga Club Principe Felipe Hotel • Three rounds of golf on a choice of La Manga Club’s three courses • Daily buffet breakfast • Fitness pass with access to indoor pool, steam room and gym at Spa La Manga Club • Return flight to Alicante with Monarch Airlines from Gatwick, Luton, Birmingham, Manchester or Leeds Bradford with one hold bag between two.
